article_text:
Bart Long & Associates Realty & Auctions

Specializing in the sale or auction of real estate & personal property. We are experts in our industry with over 20 years of experience in the world arena of auctioneering and sales. Bart Long & Associates Realty & Auction offers a full range of auction services tailored to your individual needs. We specialise in the following auctions and sales... - Residential Real Estate - Commercial & Industrial - Personal Property & Antiques- Farms, Agriculture, Equipment & Land- Fine Antiques & Upscale Collectibles Being leaders in our industry our staff has the experience to produce top results for our clients in a timely manner. Please feel free to contact our office to discuss your personal auction or sale needs. VA Auctioneer Firm 2908000732 VA Real Estate Firm 0226018843 TN Auctioneer Firm 00005298TN Real Estate Firm 00259506We value your business at Bart Long & Associates. Please let us know if you are in the market to buy, auction or sell.

article_metadata.news_keywords: #uva-wise,#library,#construction,#sim ewing,#college,#university of virginia,#lantern of light,#wise county,local,editors_pick

og.description: WISE, Va. – The University of Virginia’s College at Wise’s nearly $37 million library – dubbed a “lantern of light” by one college official -- is nearing completion after almost four years of construction.
og.title: Progress at Uva-Wise's new library
